Package net.minecraftforge.client.event

Class RenderHighlightEvent.Block

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
net.minecraftforge.client.event.RenderHighlightEvent
net.minecraftforge.client.event.RenderHighlightEvent.Block
Enclosing class:
RenderHighlightEvent
public static class RenderHighlightEvent.Block extends RenderHighlightEvent
Fired before a block's selection highlight is rendered.

This event is cancellable, and does not have a result. If the event is cancelled, then the selection highlight will not be rendered.

This event is fired on the main Forge event bus, only on the logical client.
